name: LittleSpy
0:
”Alexa, ask Little Spy to play”
”It's an elephant”
”Give me a hint”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: little spy
des:
This is the traditional "I spy with my little eye" game for Alexa. She tells you where she is and what she's spying, and you have to guess!

The places and objects are suitable for children aged 5 to 7. The objective of this game isn't just to entertain them, but also to develop their object grouping and characterisation skills.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
